items.sentence: I was surprised by how well Tom could speak French.
I was surprised to see an old friend of mine there.
I was surprised when Tom told me he had to do that.
Tom and Mary said that they haven\'t yet been paid.
Tom was wearing the old jacket that I\'d given him.
Tom wouldn\'t be crazy enough to do that, would he?
I absolutely must know what you\'re planning to do.
I asked Tom to come yesterday, but he didn\'t come.
Tom walked out on to the stage and started singing.
Tom walked up to the house and knocked on the door.
